nodes.nodeText: Hello traveller, my name is Steve. Would you like to learn about Quests?

options.optionText: No I'd rather not sorry, bye.

nodes.nodeText: I have just granted you a quest, if you press the Q key it will open up your Quests dialog. Please come back to me once you have completed the Quest
Hi did you finish the quest I gave you?

options.optionText: No I haven't yet, i'll come back when I have

nodes.nodeText: Awesome, that's great. I have given you an item for completing my quest. Go over to the Shop attendent and you can access the shop and trade.

options.optionText: Okay, I will do that thanks!

nodes.nodeText: I hope you have a great time playing this game

options.optionText: Thank you I think I will!
